section.heading: Physical therapy assistants; references thereto.
section.text: For a period of 12 months following March 6, 2007, all references to a physical therapy assistant shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed in fact.

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 2007, D.C. Law 16-220, ยง 2(f), 53 DCR 10216
